revised_prompt: Create a technologically oriented professional banner advertisement promoting a Black Friday Sale. The banner is at dimensions of 1200x628 pixels. Text must be the main focus, legibly written in bold and large sans-serif fonts on a clean, uncluttered layout. The brand name 'TechStore' should be the largest, most vibrant element prominently positioned at the top or center. The main message 'Up to 70% Off' should follow in size, positioned in the center area. Both texts should maintain high contrast against the background. Finally a distinct call-to-action button labeled 'Shop Now' should be visibly placed at the bottom of the design or in another prominent position. Professional, vibrant, eye-catching color scheme should be used. The background should be clean or subtle to not interfere with text readability. Maintain a high level of professional advertising quality with no decorative text, extra words or complex patterns behind text.
